item.title: Paramount and Hybe’s K-pop Movie Adds Ji-young Yoo and Eric Nam, Lands 2027 Release
item.description: Benson Lee will direct the film, which is expected to be the first major American studio film shot entirely in South Korea.

item.title: ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Soundtrack Hits New Peak of No. 2 on Albums Chart
item.description: Netflix and Sony Pictures Animation’s “KPop Demon Hunters” soundtrack — performed by a fictional girl group called Huntrix in the animated feature — claims the No. 2 spot
